summary:
ARM is a type of computer processor design that is popular because it uses less power and creates less heat. These processors are often found in small, portable devices like smartphones and laptops. The company Arm Holdings creates these designs and lets other businesses use them to make chips.

Over time, ARM designs have improved, allowing for bigger and better memory access. The latest version, ARMv8-A, can handle even more data with its 64-bit system. ARM processors are now used in many different devices, from supercomputers to small gadgets.
title: ARM architecture family
